short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your chat experience on Kick with new features, emotes and performance improvements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NipahTV integrates emotes from multiple providers, including native Kick and 7TV emotes, eliminating the need for multiple emote extensions.

UPDATED FOR KICK 2.0 WEBSITE
-> PLEASE READ THE IMPORTANT NOTE BELOW

Key Features:
- User-friendly emote menu
- Global and per-channel emotes for both native Kick and 7TV
- Improved moderator experience with enhanced Kick commands
- Message history feature for re-sending messages
- Quality of life options like message highlighting

Important:
Not compatible with the 7TV extension! If you want to keep the 7TV extension installed for other streaming sites like Twitch or Youtube instead of disabling it completely, follow the instructions at https://nipahtv.com/seventv_compatibility

Having issues? Please do report bugs on the github or join us at the NTV Discord community and we'll help you further. https://discord.gg/KZZZYM6ESs

Disclaimer:
NipahTV is a new project with many features yet to be implemented. Please expect some bugs and minor issues as I continue to improve the extension.
